result.arabic_text: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتَكُمۡ إِنۡ أَتَىٰكُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡ أَتَتۡكُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ أَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ تَدۡعُونَ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
result.translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Bwira ababangikanyamana uti: “Nimumbwire igihe mwoshikirwa n’ibihano vy’Imana Allah mukiri kw’isi, canke mu gihe mwoshikirwa n’umusi w’izuka, aho nyene mwombwira ko mwosaba ikitari Imana Allah, kugira kibakize intureka zabashikiye nimwaba muri imvugakuri ko ibigirwamana musenga hari ico bishoboye!”;
